Battleship

Welcome to Battleship!

Player

How to Play
Game pieces:
  • Carrier - length of 5
  • Battleship - length of 4
  • Destroyer - length of 3
  • Submarine - length of 3
  • Patrol Boat - length of 2
  • White pegs - marker for missed attacks
  • Red pegs - marker for successful attacks

Place your ships:
  • [Desktop]: Drag and drop your ships from the dock to the grid. Click on the ship once to rotate its orientation.
  • [Mobile]: Click on a ship from the dock, then click on a square on the grid. Double-click on the ship to rotate its orientation.

Start game:
  • Click the "Start" button to begin the game after you've placed all of your ships.
  • Both players will take turns attacking the other person's board.

Goal: Sink all of your opponent's ships first to win the game!

Computer
